```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(learnr)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r ttest1, exercise=TRUE, error = TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
mtcars %>% 
  t.test(continuous_var ~ group_var, data = .)
```

```{r ttest1-hint}
library(tidyverse)
mtcars %>% 
  t.test(mpg ~ group_var, data = .)
# mpg is the right continuous_var
## what is the right group_var?
```

```{r ttest1-solution}
library(tidyverse)
mtcars %>% 
  t.test(mpg ~ am, data = .)
```
